title: Broadcom forecasts $5.1B AI semiconductor revenue for Q3 2025 as AI networking demand accelerates
excerpt: Gain insights into Broadcom's record-breaking Q2 2025 earnings, driven by 20% YOY growth.
text: Earnings Call Insights: Broadcom Inc. (AVGO) Q2 2025 Management View Hock E. Tan, President and CEO, opened the call by highlighting "total revenue was a record $15 billion, up 20% year-on-year. This 20% year-on-year growth was all organic as Q2 last year was the first full quarter with VMware." html:
Earnings Call Insights: Broadcom Inc. (AVGO) Q2 2025

Management View

  • Hock E. Tan, President and CEO, opened the call by highlighting "total revenue was a record $15 billion, up 20% year-on-year. This 20% year-on-year growth was all organic as Q2 last year was the first full quarter with VMware." Tan
